title: Reusable wood cutlery set
subTitle: Say no to disposable plastic cutlery

marketingArguments.title: Organic & Reusable
marketingArguments.speech: This cutlery was designed to be eco-friendly, made of natural wood, fully respectful of nature and non-pollution. Take your own set of bamboo cutlery with you wherever you go. Reduce your plastic waste and help save the planet.

marketingArguments.title: Easy to transport
marketingArguments.speech: They are made to support you in your travels, easily stow in your backpack or lunch box.

marketingArguments.title: Multiple usage
marketingArguments.speech: This wooden cutlery set can be used in cooking, camping, picnics, party and other outdoor activities

marketingArguments.title: Optimized pocket
marketingArguments.speech: each utensil has a compartment to avoid bumping into each other, which can lead to unnecessary wear.
